facts: It takes 3 liters of water to produce a 1-liter plastic bottle
Only 9% of all plastic waste ever produced has been recycled
Recycling aluminum uses 95% less energy than producing new aluminum
An aluminum can can be recycled and back on the shelf within 60 days
Glass can be recycled endlessly without loss in quality
Glass is made from natural materials like sand, soda ash, and limestone
Recycling 1 ton of paper saves 17 trees
Recycled paper produces 73% less air pollution than new paper
Cardboard is the most recycled packaging material worldwide
Recycling 1 ton of cardboard saves 9 cubic yards of landfill space
Food waste in landfills produces methane, a greenhouse gas 25 times more potent than CO2
Composting food waste creates nutrient-rich soil for gardening
Most coffee cups have a plastic lining making them difficult to recycle
Using a reusable cup for a year can save 23kg of CO2 emissions
A plastic bag is typically used for 12 minutes but can take 500+ years to decompose
Worldwide, 1 million plastic bags are used every minute
Newspaper is one of the easiest materials to recycle
Recycling newspapers saves 34% of the energy needed to make new paper
Tin cans are actually made mostly of steel with a thin tin coating
Recycling steel saves 60% of production energy costs
Different types of plastic containers (#1-7) have different recycling processes
Some plastic containers contain BPA which can leach into food
Most milk cartons are made from paperboard with a thin polyethylene coating
Some regions require milk cartons to be rinsed before recycling
Styrofoam is actually expanded polystyrene foam (EPS)
Most recycling programs don't accept styrofoam due to processing difficulties
E-waste contains valuable recoverable materials including gold, silver, and copper
E-waste represents 2% of trash in landfills but 70% of toxic waste
One button battery can contaminate 600,000 liters of water if improperly disposed
Recycling batteries recovers metals like cobalt which is often mined under poor conditions
CFLs contain small amounts of mercury and should be disposed of properly
LED bulbs last up to 25 times longer than incandescent bulbs
It takes about 1,800 gallons of water to produce a single pair of jeans
Fast fashion is responsible for 10% of global carbon emissions
Pizza boxes with grease stains cannot be recycled and should be composted
Some pizza boxes have parts that can be torn off and recycled if not contaminated
Banana peels make excellent compost material
When landfilled, banana peels produce methane gas
Coffee grounds add nitrogen to compost piles
Used coffee grounds can repel garden pests and enhance soil
